page.title: 19Lifestyles
page.content: A day in the life of Keith. In the orning I wake up and play for a rew minutes and then go into my Dad's room to do some reading.Then I would have breakfast and I would have Weetabix, Frosties, Rice Crispies, Cocopops, Cornflakes, Kellogs Special, Start Porrige and that was all the cerials. Other times I would have bacon and eggs or toast with lemon curd on and then I would have a wash and get my school uniform on.By then my mum would take me to school and I would go into school and I would go in and hang my coat up and then line up for Assembly. An Assembly is a thing that all the people in the whole school meet together and we talk about something then we read and do all sorts of things. After school I have a sweet or something then I watch T.V. and then have tea and go to bed.
